ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This work is dedicated to the memory of Maria Paola Belloni Regazzo, who, back in 1999 had the idea of looking into biological activities of Pistacia with the aim to identify new antitumoral strategies and sustained and guided the team of scientists into the results presented here. This research was supported by private grants from Data Medica Padova SpA. Part of this work was used for patent EP 1520585 A1, and U.S. Patent Application No 10/676,101; DE602004032502D1; EP1520585B1; US20050074509; US20050163876, 2003 “ Belloni, M.P. Cancer Treatment Using Natural Plant Products or Essential Oils or Components from Some Pistacia Species”. Parts of this work were presented in scientific meetings.
